content: Yesterday Marilyn Chambers died, at 53. For you younger people, she was the Ivory Snow baby, and was one of the first main stream porn stars. She and Linda Lovelace were credited with bringing porn movies into a more 'artistic',lol, tone, and out of the seedy back rooms. I haven't watched porn in years(no really,lol), but I remember seing her movies on Showtime after dark, in the early 80's as a high schooler.
